overview: Azam is an orphan. His parents died when he was a toddler due to a car accident, and since then he has been cared for by Ustad Umar. Ustad Umar takes care of Azam like his own child. The more mature, matchmaking was already arranged with Fatimah. But the soul mate said otherwise, during the approach process, Azam suddenly met Michele, the daughter of Pak Bakrie who was a regular donor at the Islamic boarding school.
title: Amanah Cinta
